name: Guardian's Oath
description: Physics and dynamic fighting based Action RPG
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Most modern x86 CPUs supported Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 50 MB available space
